<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT = AM.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/analysismanager/#aaab1fad63e4f3b8679469720a873fedd">getResult</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortreeanalysis">DominatorTreeAnalysis</a>&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Changes to alignment shouldn&#39;t invalidated analyses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/preservedanalyses/#a1258a1ff55557c27684010ebd7283712">PreservedAnalyses::all</a>();</span></CodeLine>
